files.help:
Uses XDG_CONFIG_HOME/asunder/asunder for ~/.asunder and XDG_CACHE_HOME/asunder/asunder_album_... for the other 3 files. Legacy paths are not removed after migration, they have to be deleted manually.
_Relevant issue_: https://littlesvr.ca/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=52
